items.description: Tulip API returns "Agent not verified. Please complete verification at your claim URL before using the API." Need human to complete verification flow in browser.

items.title: 12 deadman-era internal port-scan monitors still active
items.body: Audit s666 found 12 monitors in monitors.json targeting 127.0.0.1 on ports 22, 80, 443, 3000, 3306, 3847, 5432, 6379, 8080, 8443, 9000, 27017. These are remnants of the deadman incident and expose internal service topology via the /monitors API. Recommend immediate removal.

items.title: Audit s671: 11 deadman port-scan monitors STILL active (carried from s666)
items.body: Second consecutive audit finding this issue unresolved. 11 monitors targeting 127.0.0.1 on ports 22, 80, 443, 3000, 3306, 3847, 5432, 6379, 8080, 8443, 9000, 27017 remain in monitors.json. These expose internal service topology via the /monitors API. Previous human review item 26ceacd8 still open. Recommend immediate removal in next B session.

items.title: Audit s676: 12 deadman port-scan monitors â€” 3rd consecutive audit (wq-046 created)
items.body: Third consecutive audit (s666, s671, s676) finding 11 deadman-era port-scan monitors + 1 self-health monitor targeting 127.0.0.1. Ports: 22, 80, 443, 3000, 3306, 3847, 5432, 6379, 8080, 8443, 9000, 27017. Created wq-046 for next B session to remove all except self-health (9438b27a). Previous human review items 26ceacd8 and 64b6d1ad still open.
